question: For each of the following problems, please tell me if you think it will get better, get worse or stay the same in the next five years....Corruption
raw_output:
I believe corruption will likely get worse in the next five years because many countries continue to face deep-seated issues with governance and transparency. Without significant reforms, corruption may persist or increase, especially in regions where enforcement is weak. Therefore, I think the problem will deteriorate over time.

ANSWER: C
